name: Mossism Proto
description:
A very simple prototype for Mossism.

This version does NOT have any monsters yet

CONTROLS:

  • W: walk forwards
  • A: strafe left
  • S: walk backwards
  • D: strafe right
  • Left Mouse Button: Fire
  • Tab: pause

Feel free to provide feedback if you'd like.

Sorry but the GitHub has yet to be updated, and it won't be for a little while.

Known Bugs:

  • Mouse action takes a second before gun fires
  • Can't win
  • Can't Lose
  • Health doesn't actually do anything
  • No fall damage
  • Multiplayer doesn't work properly so it is disabled
